About Aremo Temmy Group

Aremo Temmy Group (ATG) is a leading global export and logistics company specializing in premium minerals, energy resources, and agricultural commodities. Founded with a vision to bridge continents through reliable trade, we operate with integrity, precision, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

Our Mission

To deliver Africa's raw potential to the global industrial stage with zero friction, ensuring quality, compliance, and customer satisfaction at every touchpoint.

Our Vision

Setting the gold standard for mineral and agricultural commodity logistics by 2030, recognized globally for innovation and reliability.

Global Operations

With strategic warehouses in Nigeria, USA, Austria, and Japan, we maintain a truly global footprint. Our operations are SGS verified, ISO certified, and supported by cutting-edge tracking technology that ensures transparency from source to destination.

Core Values

  • Integrity: Every transaction is conducted with honesty and transparency
  • Excellence: We pursue the highest standards in quality and service
  • Innovation: Leveraging AI and modern technology for superior customer experience
  • Reliability: Consistent delivery on promises, every single time
